data.desc:
You Could Win a Weekend
Getaway at Gaithersburg Marriott Washingtonian Center!
data.title: Text
data.value: You Could Win a Weekend Getaway at Gaithersburg Marriott Washingtonian Center!

data.desc:
Let’s
help each other remember! We don’t mean to forget special occasions, but dates
are hard to recall, unless you’re lucky to have your event on a memorable one
like 12.13.14 — the century’s final sequential date.To
celebrate this crazy phenomenon, each month through 12.13.14 we’re giving away
a weekend getaway with breakfast for two at Gaithersburg Marriott Washingtonian
Center — a prize package that’s sure to make your next special occasion
memorable. Enjoy the sophisticated charm of our renovated Marriott Greatroom,
new American restaurant and elegant lakeside wedding and event space near the
nation’s capital.Submit
your best tip for remembering an occasion or brief story about something that
made an event memorable. Enter monthly — there’s a new winner on the 13th of
each month!
data.title: Text
data.value:
Let’s help each other remember! We don’t mean to forget special occasions, but dates are hard to recall, unless you’re lucky to have your event on a memorable one like 12.13.14 — the century’s final sequential date.
To celebrate this crazy phenomenon, each month through 12.13.14 we’re giving away a weekend getaway with breakfast for two at Gaithersburg Marriott Washingtonian Center — a prize package that’s sure to make your next special occasion memorable. Enjoy the sophisticated charm of our renovated Marriott Greatroom, new American restaurant and elegant lakeside wedding and event space near the nation’s capital.
Submit your best tip for remembering an occasion or brief story about something that made an event memorable. Enter monthly — there’s a new winner on the 13th of each month!

data.desc:
No purchase necessary. Open to legal residents of the 50 U.S. and D.C., 21+.

The Sweepstakes is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with, Facebook. You understand that you are providing your information to Marriott International, Inc. and not to Facebook. The information you provide will only be used in connection with this Sweepstakes or in connection with promotional or other activities of Marriott International, Inc.
